text:
More big news! HubSpot's CMS is now part of a brand new Hub. *Introducing Content Hub*. Content Hub is a place for all of your content, even the content that shows on your WordPress site. Developers modules you built on HubSpot, can now be displayed on WordPress. Not just that, there's a ton of AI goodness, Content Remix + Brand Voice lets you create new content by remixing your existing content. For example website pages can the AI inspiration for blog posts and social posts. HubSpot is also a Podcast hosting platform now too. Building a membership site on HubSpot's CMS? *Memberships are available in Pro now.*
<https://www.HubSpot.com/products/content>
Reminder: Please keep conversations related to announcements in threads and keep conversations unrelated to the announcements in other channels. This makes it so folks can easily find news.
